data.oai_dc:dc: Census - Spartina Production. Spartina alterniflora production: Goat Island high marsh nitrogen fertilizer and control. Oyster Landing high and low marsh.

The long term study of Spartina alterniflora in salt marsh ecosystems. Specifically, the measurement of biomass, production, and stem density in various marsh sites to understand long-term patterns of Spartina growth and to relate these patterns to other factors in the LTER study.
